comments:
NPE this one prevented PackageExplorer from setting up on workbench startup; I got a click here to see stack trace instead of the normal project trees.

I restarted eclipse -clean and it restarted ok.

Looks like the URIConverter is null, possible start up issue
Can this still be reproduced on WTP 1.5.1 081106 integration driver?

It was a one off freak incident, never seen before or after.  I thought the stack trace maybe useful, my box is a fast P4 dual CPU SMP and with 1.5.0 release I've have numerious startup issues.

I have been using more recent builds than 1.5.0 release, but not that recent it was either with:

eclipse_3_2_WTP_1.5.1-200607201712
eclipse_3_2_WTP_1.5.1-200607272136

When the incident occured.

Please close this bug if you have investigated possible scenarios based on the stack trace and believe there is nothing more to do.
Verified that this does not happen in the test build.
Reopening, in order to put into a valid closed state as remind is now deprecated, and closed, remind, does not make much sense.

Resolving as won't fix, as these had previously been closed out, if this is incorrect, please provide more data and reopen.

Thanks,
